content.rendered:
On-site Mobile welding repair service.Please email your enquiries for a same day turnaround to info@gatesandrailingsuk.com. Fabrications to installations as fast as 5 days. Please call us on 020 8964 2857 anytime.

We specialise in on-site mobile welding for both domestic and commercial customers

Call us
Send a message

IF YOU CAN’T COME TO US, BIG FERRO WILL COME TO YOU.

At Big Ferro, we are renowned specialists in metal fabrication and mobile welding repairs. We understand the challenges faced when it’s impractical to dismantle or transport items requiring welding. Such situations, we believe, can be inconvenient, often leading to additional costs and delays. Recognising this, we tailored our services to bring our expert welding techniques directly to your location. Our mobile welding service ensures that you receive the highest quality repairs without the hassle of transportation. Whether it’s a minor repair or a significant fabrication task, our team is equipped to handle it on-site welding and repairs . This not only saves you time but also ensures that the integrity and functionality of the item are maintained. With Big Ferro’s mobile welding, you’re guaranteed a seamless, efficient, and timely service, no matter the complexity of the task.

Ask for a Mobile Welding service estimation now !

Repairs & Alterations

Restorations

Fabrication

Custom Welding Projects

Contact us for an on-site welding or special request

info@bigferro.co.uk
02089642857
info@bigferro.co.uk
02089642857

We can take our mobile welding repair services anywhere in LONDON, and are able to weld mild steel, cast iron, stainless steel, and aluminium.

HOME & OFFICE

We supply, install and repair: Metal security gates, security grilles, security fences, metal doors, security screens, gate locks etc.

METALWORK RESTORATION

Our mobile welding services include the restoration of all sorts of metal items, residential, commercial, industrial and include any of the following types of examples: Stairways/railings (both exterior railings and interior railings), platforms, catwalks, mezzanines, hand rails, safety railings, custom gates, drain gates, continuous fencing, grates, tables, metal platform steps, decks, etc.

STRUCTURAL WELDING

Beams Welding
RSJ Beam
Construction project Welding
Heavy Equipment Repair
Structural Steel Welding
Girders Welding
Columns Welding

RESIDENTIAL & COMMERCIAL WELDING


Metal Roofing
Steel Garden Gates
Driveway Gates
Metal Garden Fence
Railing Repairs
Metal Frame Welding
Steel Framing
Metal Railings
Pedestrian Gates
Steel Equipment Repair

GATES, RAILINGS AND STAIRCASES

We offer professional service, covering all aspects of metal refurbishment and restoration of metal gates, railings, stairs and balustrades.

Our team can: fix broken parts in your gate, replace gate hinges and locking mechanisms, weld and replace any metal gate parts, restore old gates to look like new, improve your gate locking and security systems.

Welding service operating in London and surrounding areas

Contact Us to get an estimate

Gates, Railings & Stairs    |    Bespoke metalwork services    |    Maintenance    |    Mobile Welding    |    Powder Coating    |    Automation   |    Shot Blasting
